message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.MM. 

The paper deals with video question answering, which involves understanding and conversing about dynamic scenes using AI agents. This falls under the intersection of computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The paper proposes a novel approach for generating token-level video summaries guided by each word in the question, which involves incorporating features from multiple modalities, a common challenge in AI research. This suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the sub-categories of artificial intelligence (cs.AI), machine learning (cs.LG), and multimedia (cs.MM).
